rules_text:
Flying
When this creature enters, exile up to one other target creature or enchantment. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. If a creature enters under an opponent's control this way, it enters tapped with a stun counter on it.
notes:
A tempo deck that uses blink synergies to draw cards and keep opposing creatures at bay while it wins with fliers.
